item.title: 'Anti-ICE' message on ammunition at Dallas shooting that killed immigration detainee
item.description: The gunman fired at an unmarked van near the detention facility, before taking his own life, officials say.

item.title: Malawi's ex-president wins election in comeback at age 85
item.description: Peter Mutharika defeated the incumbent, Lazarus Chakwera, the election commission announces.

item.title: Twenty injured in Yemen drone attack on Israel, rescuers and military say
item.description: Two have been taken to hospital with serious shrapnel injuries, the Magen David Adom ambulance service says.

item.title: Russia will expand aggression beyond Ukraine if not stopped, Zelensky warns
item.description: Vladimir Putin "will keep driving the war forward wider and deeper", the Ukrainian president tells the UN.

item.title: Meet the history-making astronauts headed for the Moon
item.description: Astronauts of Nasa's first crewed mission to the Moon for more than 50 years hope their journey inspires a new generation.
